topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.1: Deploy the KVM Region Patch 5

bodydiv.section:
PrerequisitesYou should have installed the following patches during the installation of the KVM Region:
KVM Region Custom Patch ()
PCI Bus Patch ()
KVM Custom Patch 3 ()
KVM Custom Patch 4 () You can use the Horizon UI to see if the patch has been deployed. Select the regionkvm, then click Admin, then System, and Inventory. Click the Patches table for the patches. Or use the CLI on the active KVM controller: sudo sw-patch query.

section.title: Start the patch download
section.p: To download the patch you need from the Software Updates and Licensing site, shown above:

ol.li: Select the required patch file (e.g. ) from the Downloads list and then click Download.

Un-tar the downladed files (compressed patch files with extension tar.gz and .tar) until the TS_HP_15_Custom_PATCH_0005.patch and readme files are available.The tar files specified under Download filenameon the Software Licensing site are listed separately for HCG_2.0 and HCG_2.1 versions but when downloaded and extracted both the versions refer to a common tar file in the readme.

Check if the MD5 checksum verification file is extracted along with the patch file.
For validating the integrity of the downloaded file, you can run the MD5 checksum verification on the downloaded patch file and verify if the fingerprint of the file matches the version available on the server.
